flawed_nl_solution:
Micah can type 20 x 60 = <<20*60=1200>>1200 words in an hour.
Isaiah can type 40 x 60 = <<2400=2400>>2400 words in an hour.
Isaiah can type 2400 - 1200 = <<2400-1200=2100>>2100 words more than Micah in an hour.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1200, not 2100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
